video.title: Strange Hill High
video.synopsis: Three students investigate numerous unusual occurrences at Strange Hill High, an all-but-forgotten inner-city school with many secrets and mysteries.

episodes.synopsis: Behind the walls of a lavatory at Strange Hill High, Mitchell, Becky and Templeton discover an ancient chamber that changes their lives forever.
episodes.title: King Mitchell

episodes.synopsis: Unintended consequences follow when Mitchell, who's running late the first day of exams, sets back the old tower clock 10 minutes.
episodes.title: 99 Cool Things to Do With a Time Machine

episodes.synopsis: When things begin disappearing at Strange Hill, Mitchell finds himself the prime suspect. Can he clear his name and find the real culprit?
episodes.title: The Lost and Found Boy

episodes.synopsis: Becky dreams of becoming a big musical star in a school production. Unfortunately, her singing is terrible.
episodes.title: Snoozical

episodes.synopsis: After the school chef wins over students with his new sweet treats, Becky decides to sell healthy snacks.
episodes.title: Big Mouth Strikes Again

episodes.synopsis: With students disappearing after reading a mysterious library book, Mitchell and his friends investigate.
episodes.title: The Most Boring Book in the World

episodes.synopsis: To get tickets to see their favorite rapper in concert, Mitchell and his friends write stories for the school newspaper.
episodes.title: Read All About It

episodes.synopsis: When Mitchell, Becky and Templeton are forced to watch a horrible school-safety film from the 1970s, they find themselves trapped in the movie.
episodes.title: Health and Safety

episodes.synopsis: Looking for a place to hide from his teachers after not doing his assignments, Mitchell stumbles on an unused classroom that turns out to be haunted.
episodes.title: The Ghost Writers of Strange Hill High

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell, Becky and Templeton are tasked with cleaning the old science room, where they discover a device that changes the size of matter.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet

episodes.synopsis: Becky wants to join the cheerleading squad but is ruled out by the stuck-up cheerleaders, so she becomes the team mascot instead.
episodes.title: Lucky Becky

episodes.synopsis: With election day coming, it's Becky’s chance to win and gain the popularity she craves -- and an idea from Mitchell gives her the competitive edge.
episodes.title: Becky vs. Bocky

episodes.synopsis: When the new computer technology at Strange Hill seems too perfect, it's up to Mitchell and his friends to find out what's behind the changes.
episodes.title: The End of Terminator

episodes.synopsis: A bite by a rabid deputy headmaster infects Mitchell with a curse: every time the school bell rings, he becomes a strict teacher named Mr. Tanner.
episodes.title: The Curse of the Were-teacher

episodes.synopsis: Templeton's science fair exhibit creates an invasion of aliens who've come to Earth seeking their creator, who they all happen to resemble.
episodes.title: Invasion of the Templetons

episodes.synopsis: When Mitchell cheats on an impossible math assignment, he gets an impossible grade of 101 percent, destroying math ... and maybe the world.
episodes.title: 101% Solution

episodes.synopsis: Becky's green thumb proves a bit too effective when her attempt to revive a sick plant creates half-plant/half-PE-teachers bent on world domination.
episodes.title: Little School of Horrors

episodes.synopsis: Templeton's position as security monitor goes to his head when he discovers that the new surveillance system can reveal the future.
episodes.title: Big Templeton Is Watching You!

episodes.synopsis: When Mitchell's April Fool's Day prank spree unleashes the Beast of Embarrassment, he must take part in a bizarre game show to save his friends.
episodes.title: Crushing Embarrassment

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell accidentally erases himself from history after deleting his school record. At first his anonymity is fun, but soon he starts to disappear.
episodes.title: Mitchell Who?

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell and his friends' attempt to cure Abercrombie's objection to Valentine's Day leads to a strange new world: inside the headmaster's mind!
episodes.title: Innercrombie

episodes.synopsis: A midwinter swimming test leads to the discovery of an island oasis in the pool, inhabited by a giant exchange student named Ken Kong.
episodes.title: Ken Kong

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell is issued a strange simulation baby doll to teach him responsibility. He tries to throw it away, but it freakishly keeps coming back.
episodes.title: Mitchell Junior

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell, Becky and Templeton stumble across an underground lair that was home to a group of medieval superheroes -- Ye Olde Righteousness League.
episodes.title: MCDXX Men

episodes.synopsis: With the annual Strange Hill Festival just around the corner, the school welcomes a new music teacher who has a connection to the ancient event.
episodes.title: The Snide Piper

episodes.synopsis: Mitchell's desperate attempt to start his Christmas holiday early is scuppered when he accidentally traps everyone in the freezing school.
episodes.title: Strange Hill High Christmas
